property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: Name of the icon to be used in the header

property.name: objApiName
property.label: Object Api Name
property.description: Api name of the related object

property.name: filterFieldsMap
property.label: Filter to fields map
property.description: JSON string version of a map of filter name from the filter component to field name on the SObject. Eg: {"myFilter":{"addQuotes":false,"fieldName":"MyCustomField__c"}}

property.name: parentFieldName
property.label: Parent Field Name
property.description: Name of the parent lookup or M/D field for which related records should be shown

property.name: fieldNames
property.label: Field Names
property.description: Comma separated list of fields to show
